mapper.select: select h.ticket_no, h.history_date, h.ticket_code, t.ticket_price from history h inner join ticket t on h.ticket_code = t.ticket_code where email = #{email}

select h.ticket_no, h.history_date, h.ticket_code, t.ticket_price from history h inner join ticket t on h.ticket_code = t.ticket_code where h.email = #{email} and h.ticket_code is not null order by h.history_date desc
mapper.update: UPDATE history SET ticket_code = null WHERE ticket_no = #{ticketNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history(num, email, ticket_code, ticket_no) VALUES(h_seq.nextval, #{email}, #{ticketCode}, #{ticketNo})
